name: RAVER ][: Carnage Remixed!
description:
"RAVER ][: Carnage Remixed!" picks up the torch where "RAVER: Bliss in Bloodshed!" left off and takes a more aggressive approach to the bloodshed.  The game takes quite an advantage of Unity-3D's capabilities and provides spooky, cartoonish visuals and lots of neon.

The game's Campaign Mode currently features 7 levels, several tough bosses, mechanical enemies and silly mechanics. All here to bring forth a badass, blood-splattered cartoony fragfest. After the Campaign, or at your leisure; you can head on over to the Audio Room and jam out to the game's soundtrack!


It's Halloween of 2044; The Lucilium Outbreak firmly tightens its grip on Retropolia, crippling the region to its very core as the people have been driven out of their homes by the large packs of radioactive mutants taking over, frantically battling their way through the bloodstained streets in an effort to stay alive.

Throughout all the violence ripping the region apart; Razor-Sergeant Luna-837 remains composed; continuing his spectral wave of vengeance by killing every mutants he encounters, punishing those responsible for the atrocity and ensuring the survivors have a safe passage to flee...

Need a little advice?  Want to learn more about the awesomeness within? Check out the Official Player's Manual here!;

https://raver-ll-carnage-remixed.carrd.co/

Constructive criticism is always helpful! If you find ANY bugs or issues, please don't hesitate to let the studio know! The easiest way is through Twitter DMs;

https://twitter.com/LeadNexusStudio

Like the game? Hate the game? Leave a comment all about your experience.

Thanks, and Happy Slaying!
- Leady
